question: The Stomata in the aquatic plants is ________?
option2: Found & available on both the surfaces
option3: Found & available on upper surface only
option4: Found and available only on lower surface
answer: Found & available on upper surface only
explanation: The Stomata in the aquatic plants is found and available on upper surface only. Stomata are crucial for plant functioning as they play fundamental role in the regulation of gas exchange between the plant and its surrounding environment.
